"Oh, Master. I hope you're doing well.": "...Say Master. I've been thinking for some time. I wish to master the art of hospitality..."
"If the opportunity to provide it comes but once... Then I will do all within my abilities to provide service that will leave me without regrets."
"That is why I would like to put Etoile's fighting style to good use."
"But for me personally... Providing excellent hospitality is not something that comes solely from elevating one's abilities."
"Allies may be but strangers. There may never come another chance to meet with them again. That is why I want to cherish our meetings."
"To grant strength and courage through my hospitality, to shine like a soothing light, like the warmth of a \"star\" watching over them..."
"That is why the name \"Etoile\" comes from \"star\"."
"Heroes charge into battle against the odds, Phantoms target the weaknesses of troublesome opponents to eliminate them swiftly."
"And Etoile... uses hospitality to maximize the fortunes of fighting alongside allies."
"Locked in a neverending nightmare, forced to fight alone... I wish for that never to happen to anyone again."
"Ha... I am sorry! I mustn't let my mind wander... It was nothing!"
"...You are right. I have Stratos and Kyo... And you too, Master!"
"Besides, it was Maria's suggestion to give form to Etoile through my love for hospitality..."
"So it was founded by both of us. If I let myself become dejected, it will cause Maria to be dejected too!"
"Yes, it has been decided! I will work myself both as a maid, and as lead proponent of Etoile..."
"To provide the absolute finest in hospitality. I look forward to your assistance, Master!"
